page.title: 18ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: {CONCERT PARTY A concert is organised which involves many village people.The first half is Variety and the second is a play done by the women. The concert takes place for 3 nights in November and the proceeds are shared between the Village Hall, the Church and the Darby and Joan Club. {VEGETABLE, FLOWER AND FRUIT SHOW This is held in August jointly with a Garden Party and is for the parishoners of North Kyme only.There are classes for vegetables, flower, fruit,cakes and adult and children craft work. {HARVEST SUPPER} This is held in a barn at Dovecote Farm and the proceeds go to the Church Funds.
